newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Foreigners buy 1.02 bln rand S.Africa bonds Fri.
newsitem.headline: Foreigners buy 1.02 bln rand S.Africa bonds Fri.

text.p: Foreigners were net buyers of 1,016.37 million rand worth of bonds on Friday after buying 156.16 million rand's worth on Thursday, the Bond Exchange said.
